thread.title: More Amritsar Akali leaders quit

author: tribuneindia.com
title: More Amritsar Akali leaders quit
text:
Tribune News Service
Amritsar, October 25
A number of leaders of the Akali Dal, mainly presidents of three circles and seven wards, today resigned from the party. They said they were let down by the leadership over the controversy surrounding pardon to Dera Sacha Sauda chief Gurmeet Ram Rahim and incidents of desecration of Guru Granth Sahib. So far five circle heads have tendered their resignations. The district unit of Akali Dal comprises 15 circles. The resignations came a day after SAD (Urban) head Upkar Singh Sandhu resigned from the party yesterday. Those who resigned today are Jatinder Singh Bhalla from Puttalighar area, Bakshish Singh from Fatahpur, Harvinder Singh Sandhu from Civil Lines. The ward heads are Bhupinder Singh, Harpal Singh Pannu, Kulbir Singh, Rajiv Ghai, Waryam Singh, Raj Kumar Chabbra and Yashpal Singh. Mohkampura circle head Kuldeep Singh along with three ward heads, a former councillor and 50 members also quit the party.
